# Transboundary {#tbr}

Here is the information available for the steelhead five CUs in the Transboundary region. Steelhead CUs in this region were defined in [Parkinson et al. 2005](https://salmonwatersheds.ca/library/lib_521/).


![Map of the Transboundary region of the Pacific Salmon Explorer and major watershed basins](_bookdown_files/map_transboundary_region.png)


## *Stikine Winter*

CU id: 1084

### Populations 

```{r echo=FALSE}
cu_list <- read.csv("_bookdown_files/steelhead_cu_population_lookup_2022.csv")


cu_list[ (cu_list$cu_id %in% c("1084")), c(3,4,11)]

```
